items.content_html: @skipper116/string-utilities is a lightweight collection of string manipulation and validation utilities built for JavaScript and TypeScript projects. This package provides functions to trim, convert, validate, and generate string values efficiently.

items.content_html: TabZen is a lightweight, powerful Chrome extension designed to help you manage and declustter your browser tabs efficiently. Whether you have a few or dozens of tabs open, TabZen ensures you're always in control, boosting productivity and enhancing your browsing experience.
items.title: omar-ao/TabZen: TabZen is a lightweight, powerful Chrome extension designed to help you manage and declustter your browser tabs efficiently. Whether you have a few or dozens of tabs open, TabZen ensures you're always in control, boosting productivity and enhancing your browsing experience.

items.content_html: Drizzle ORM is a lightweight TypeScript-first ORM designed for optimal type safety and SQL query generation, making database interactions straightforward and reliable. It emphasizes simplicity and minimal runtime overhead, making it a good choice for modern TypeScript projects.
items.title: abhik1289/drizzle_learning:  Drizzle ORM is a lightweight TypeScript-first ORM designed for optimal type safety and SQL query generation, making database interactions straightforward and reliable. It emphasizes simplicity and minimal runtime overhead, making it a good choice for modern TypeScript projects.

items.content_html: Kalpanix is a lightweight CSS framework that provides a simple CDN and pre-designed classes for creating responsive, modern web designs. Just include the CDN and apply the classes in your HTML to instantly style your site with ease and flexibility. Perfect for fast, clean UI development.
items.title: bids24/Kalpanix: Kalpanix is a lightweight CSS framework that provides a simple CDN and pre-designed classes for creating responsive, modern web designs. Just include the CDN and apply the classes in your HTML to instantly style your site with ease and flexibility. Perfect for fast, clean UI development.
